entries.name: Size
entries: You are Small or Medium. You choose the size when you select this race.

entries.name: Speed
entries: You have a walking speed of 30 feet

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Hefest's craft
entries: Your skin and flesh are crafted from the stone of the mountains, you have resistance to necrotic damage

entries.name: Moldable Stone
entries: Your Soul gem's magic lets you mold the stone around you, making it alive and temporarily a part of you. You gain proficiency with {@item Mason's Tools|PHB} and do not require {@item Mason's Tools|PHB} to attempt a {@item Mason's Tools|PHB} check.

entries.name: Kailagh's Connection
entries: The magic that grants you life allows you to alter the stone around you as you reach out with it, you gain the ability to cast {@spell Attune with Stone|M:Elebus} as a cantrip.

entries.name: Crystal Growth
entries: You can use your action to unleash your soul gem's innate magic and cause shards of crystals to grow out the ground in a 10 food radius circle centred on you.

When you use your Crystal Growth, the area around you becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in the area must make a strength saving throw. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature that fails the save has its speed reduced to 0.
You can use your Crystal Growth a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read. and write Common, Stone Speak, and one other language that you and your DM agree is appropriate for your character.
